tagline: Create an observability map based on any of the data available in New Relic.
details: Create an observability map based on any of the data available in New Relic.
whatsNew:
- Drilldown dashboards: Ability to open any specified dashboard for a given node (right click option) - dashboards are retrieved and selectable based upon user input in the Edit menu. 
 - Add infra hover metrics 
 - Show db connection on hover 
 - Add synthetics summary support
